meanings.definition: A person who fences with an epee.
meanings.sent1: The skilled epeeist swiftly parried his opponent's attacks.
meanings.sent2: The epeeist won the fencing competition with precise moves.
meanings.sent3: The epeeist walked into a room full of foils and sabres, feeling out of place.
meanings.sent4: She was a true epeeist, always ready to defend herself in any situation.
meanings.sent5: The epeeist's determination shone through in every match.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sport of fencing with an epee.
meanings.sent1: The epeeist equipment was carefully inspected before the tournament.
meanings.sent2: Her epeeist skills were evident in the way she held the weapon.
meanings.sent3: The epeeist uniform was designed for maximum agility during matches.
meanings.sent4: The epeeist spirit of camaraderie was strong among the team members.
meanings.sent5: The epeeist style of fencing required precision and quick reflexes.
